member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.Abstractions.IDomainRelayDbContextResolver
member.summary: Resolves which DbContext should be used for a given request type. Enables multi-DbContext transaction behavior.

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.DomainEvents.IDomainEvent
member.summary: Marker interface for domain events to be persisted to the Outbox.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.DomainEvents.IDomainEvent.EventId
member.summary: Unique event id for idempotency.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.DomainEvents.IDomainEvent.OccurredOnUtc
member.summary: When the event occurred (UTC).

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.DomainEvents.IHasDomainEvents
member.summary: Implemented by aggregate roots/entities that produce domain events.

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.Abstractions.IOutboxPublisher
member.summary: Transport abstraction. You implement this to publish events to your bus (RabbitMQ, Kafka, HTTP webhook, SignalR, etc.)

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.Abstractions.IOutboxTypeRegistry
member.summary: Allowlist mapping from TypeKey -> CLR Type, to safely deserialize payloads.

member.name: M:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.Admin.IOutboxAdmin.GetDeadLettersAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the most recent dead-letter messages (IDs + metadata).

member.name: M:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.Admin.IOutboxAdmin.RequeueAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{System.Guid},System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Requeue message(s) back to Pending state and eligible immediately.

member.name: M:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.Admin.IOutboxAdmin.PurgeProcessedOlderThanAsync(System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Purge processed messages older than cutoff.

member.name: M:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.Admin.IOutboxAdmin.DeleteByIdsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{System.Guid},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Hard delete by ids (dangerous; use for GDPR removal etc.).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.Admin.OutboxAdminOptions.MaxBulkOperationSize
member.summary: Max number of IDs you can requeue/purge in one call to avoid accidental mass operations.

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.Dispatching.OutboxDispatcher`1
member.summary: Executes outbox dispatch loop logic (claim -> publish -> finalize). Provider-agnostic using optimistic concurrency.

member.name: M:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.Hosting.DomainRelayOutboxBuilder`1.WithDbContextOptions(System.Action{System.IServiceProvider,Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptionsBuilder})
member.summary: REQUIRED. Configures both DbContext and DbContextFactory with the same options (provider/connection string).

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxEnvelope
member.summary: Message envelope given to the transport publisher.

member.name: M:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxEnvelope.#ctor(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.String,System.Int32,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Message envelope given to the transport publisher.

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage
member.summary: Durable outbox record (provider-agnostic design).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.EventId
member.summary: Logical event id (for downstream idempotency).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.TypeKey
member.summary: Event type key (resolved through registry).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.Version
member.summary: Version for payload schema evolution.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.OccurredOnUtc
member.summary: Occurred time (UTC).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.EnqueuedAtUtc
member.summary: When it was inserted into the outbox (UTC).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.ProcessedAtUtc
member.summary: When successfully dispatched (UTC).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.AttemptCount
member.summary: How many times dispatch has been attempted.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.NextAttemptUtc
member.summary: Next eligible time for dispatch (UTC), supports backoff.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.LockedUntilUtc
member.summary: Lease / lock expiry (UTC). If expired, other workers may claim.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.LockedBy
member.summary: Identifier of the worker that currently owns the lease.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.LastError
member.summary: Last error summary (truncated).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.HeadersJson
member.summary: Arbitrary headers for transport (json).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.PayloadJson
member.summary: Payload json.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.ContentType
member.summary: Content type (default: application/json).

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.CorrelationId
member.summary: Optional correlation id for tracing.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxMessage.RowVersion
member.summary: Optimistic concurrency token.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.Schema
member.summary: DB schema name. Null means default schema.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.TableName
member.summary: Outbox table name.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.PollingInterval
member.summary: How often the dispatcher polls the DB.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.CleanupInterval
member.summary: How often cleanup runs.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.BatchSize
member.summary: How many messages to claim per batch.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.LeaseDuration
member.summary: How long a claim lease is valid.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.MaxAttempts
member.summary: Max attempts before dead-letter.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.BackoffBaseDelay
member.summary: Base delay for backoff.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.BackoffMaxDelay
member.summary: Max delay for backoff.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.ProcessedRetention
member.summary: Cleanup: delete Processed messages older than this. Set to null to disable deletion.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.InstanceId
member.summary: Worker instance id for lease ownership.

member.name: P:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxOptions.VerboseLogging
member.summary: When true, dispatcher will log debug details more often (may be noisy).

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxSaveChangesInterceptor
member.summary: Captures domain events from tracked entities and persists them to OutboxMessages in the same SaveChanges transaction.

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.Outbox.OutboxTypeRegistry
member.summary: Default allowlist registry. You must register event types explicitly.

member.name: T:DomainRelay.EFCore.Resolvers.DictionaryDbContextResolver
member.summary: Map request types to DbContext via predicates or explicit type mapping.
